attributes.action: Legalise the use of Whole Plant Cannabis for Medical use in Children & Adults
attributes.additional_details: My name is Mairi, I have a 5 year old little girl called Sophie. Sophie has a severe epilepsy syndrome and has up to or over 100 seizures a day. At the age of 5 she has been through the mill and tried it all. All pharmaceuticals, diets and gone through brain surgery twice. We are out of options. I have been in discussions with her neurologist about Cannabis for over 2 years and we have still gotten nowhere. I have been told that this is Sophie's best shot...yet I cannot get access to it.
attributes.background:
The evidence can no longer be ignored. We are being left to needlessly suffer. In this country, the UK, one of the most developed countries in the World, I find that an absolute disgrace. 
Cannabis has the ability to save lives.
Please read full petition here- https://mairidundas.wordpress.com/
